Hong Chang Su emerges as world pro-boxing champion
articles.content:
Hong Chang Su emerges as world pro-boxing champion 
     Tokyo, August 28 (KNS-KCNA) -- Hong Chang Su, 25, Korean pro-boxer under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, punched down the South Korean world champion by a 3-0 decision in the World Super Flyweight Championship Tournament of the World Boxing Council held in japan on August 27.
   It was the first time in the history of pro-boxing that a Korean boxer in Japan won the world championship.    
   Hong took the initiative in the match  from the beginning through blistering attacks and knocked down the opponent with the right hand hit in the fourth round.

articles.content:
Executive director of KEDO arrives 
    Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The executive director of the Korean Peninsula Energy Development Organization (KEDO) and his party arrived here today by air to visit the DPRK for the construction of light water reactors.

articles.title: Delegation of south side arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of south side arrives 
     Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the south side headed by Unification Minister Pak Jae Gyu arrived here today to participate in the 2nd round of the north-south ministerial talks, authorities to authorities talks to implement the agreed points of the historic north-south joint declaration.
   It was greeted at the airport by representatives of the north side.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il receives gifts from ITF figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il receives gifts from ITF figures 
     Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts separately from vice-president of the International Taekwon-do Federation Ri Ki Ha and deputy chief for planning of the ITF and chairman of the Asian Taekwon-do Federation Ligay Volmir.
   Gifts were handed to officials concerned.
